<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve base model"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/models/{base_model_name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a model instance, providing basic information about the model such as the hyper parameters that can be adjusted

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"base_model_name","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The name of the base model to use for this request","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The base model object matching the specified name.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"Llama-3.2-1B-Instruct"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["completion","classification","embeddings","chat"],"example":"completion"},"parameter_template":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"number"},{"type":"integer"}]}},"support_serverless":{"type":"boolean","example":false}},"title":"BaseModelSummary"}}}},"404":{"description":"Not Found error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["status","error","code"],"properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":404},"error":{"type":"string","example":"Not found"},"code":{"type":"string","example":"object_not_found"}},"title":"ApiErrorNotFound"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
